snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored once and had two assists and Martin Brodeur was dazzling in the goal as the Devils beat the Penguins.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-1; other NHL results noted.
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored once and had two assists and Martin Brodeur was dazzling in the goal as the Devils beat the Penguins.

headline.seo: Kovalchuk and Brodeur Shine as Devils Beat Penguins
headline.main: Kovalchuk Scores on Penalty Shot as the Devils Defeat the Penguins
headline.print_headline: Kovalchuk Scores on Penalty Shot as the Devils Defeat the Penguins
